content: I'm going to begin on Slide 4, where today, we announced strong results for the first quarter of 2022 with net income of $21.5 million and earnings of $1.35 or 7.1% over the same period of 2021. Customers increased by 551 or 1.5% over the first quarter of 2021, reflecting growth in both the residential and commercial customer classes. Gas adjusted gross margin was $52 million for the quarter, an increase of $4.2 million or 8.8% compared to the first quarter of 2021. As mentioned, first quarter 2022 adjusted gross margin increased by a combined $5.1 million, primarily as a result of higher distribution rates, customer growth and colder winter weather.
